content: HovR is built on Qiâ€”one of the most advanced blockchains in the world. Leveraging this network, HovR guarantees remarkably lower fees and an NFT marketplace ideal for real-time use cases. HovR focuses primarily on substantial NFT offerings such as in-game trading collectibles, purchase of web 3.0 domain, safekeeping of wills, ticket touting, social media avatars, and other NFTs with real value.Learn more about Hovr1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 10 October - 06 November (4 weeks)2. 25,000 QIE coins will be distributed within 1 month after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread!Â 4. Connect with Hovr in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/HovrSite- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hovr.site/- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hovr.site/- Telegram: https://t.me/HovRonQiblockchain- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/hovrNFT/- Learn more about Â Hovr: Â https://hovr.site/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;- Bounty Group: Â https://t.me/hovrbounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsNote:If you are disqualified for any reason, you will NOT receive any rewards. All rights reserved by Fox Campaigns and the Hovr team. We can make any changes to the campaign rules, if applicable.By joining these campaigns, you're accepting these above terms.Code:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:QI wallet address:25,000 QIE coins will be distributed in this campaign. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Signature (weekly payments):Â Â ðŸ”¹Member: 15 QIE / weekÂ Â ðŸ”¹Full Member: 20 QIE / weekÂ Â ðŸ”¹Senior Member: 30 QIE / weekÂ Â ðŸ”¹Hero Member: 45 QIE / weekÂ Â ðŸ”¹Legendary Member: 55 QIE / week- Twitter Campaign: 30%- Content Campaign: 20% - Reserved: 10%Note:Only 15 participants will be accepted in each signature rank!Tokens:-1 - 10 stakes depending on the content quality (video/article).Rules:- Videos must have at least 200 views to qualify.- We accept original videos only with at least 3 minutes.- Only English language is accepted in videos and articles.- Write a good description about Hovr in your video. - Videos with no user's voice will not be accepted.- Attach Hovr links in your video description and articles.- Only YouTube videos will be accepted!- 2 videos and 2 articles per person are allowed.- Articles must have at least 50 views to qualify.- We accept original articles only with at least 500 words.- Submit articles on Medium, Steem, Linkedin, ReadCash. Â - Visit hovr.site to learn more about it and write your articles.JOIN HERE Â  - Â  SPREADSHEETS Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Hovr Twitter account: @HovrSite3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Twitter accounts will be audited, only those with real followers will be accepted!6.
